original_title: Fight For Japan: Genki Desu Ka Omisoka 2011
overview: Also known as Fight for Japan. How are you! New Year! 2011 was a mixed martial arts, puroresu and kickboxing event in the annual New Year's Eve event promoted by Dream, M-1 Global and the Inoki Genome Federation that took place on December 31, 2011 at the Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan.
title: Fight For Japan: Genki Desu Ka Omisoka 2011
